channel.title: CVE Feed for D-Link -- D-View 8
channel.description: The latest CVEs for D-Link -- D-View 8

item.title: CVE-2023-5074|2024-08-02T07:44:53.803Z -- d-link -- d-view%208
item.description: Use of a static key to protect a JWT token used in user authentication can allow an for an authentication bypass in D-Link D-View 8 v2.0.1.28

item.title: CVE-2023-7163|2024-08-02T08:50:08.338Z -- d-link -- d-view%208
item.description: A security issue exists in D-Link D-View 8 v2.0.2.89 and prior that could allow an attacker to manipulate the probe inventory of the D-View service. This could result in the disclosure of information from other probes, denial of service conditions due to the probe inventory becoming full, or the execution of tasks on other probes.
